Name: Hirata disease
Definition: An autoimmune disease of endocrine system characterized by hypoglycemia caused by antibodies to insulin.

Name: Graves' disease
Definition: An autoimmune disease of endocrine system that involves production of excessive amount of thyroid hormones

Name: autoimmune polyendocrine syndrome
Definition: An autoimmune disease of endocrine system characterized by abnormal functioning of the immune system that causes auto-reactivity against endocrine organs.

Name: obsolete endocrine tuberculosis
Definition: An autoimmune disease of endocrine system characterized by abnormal functioning of the immune system that causes auto-reactivity against endocrine organs.

Name: autoimmune thyroiditis
Definition: An autoimmune disease of endocrine system that involves inflammation located_in thyroid gland caused by the immune system reacting against its own tissues.
